content: Please note that this Prediction Contest is exclusively for participants of Sportsbet.io sponsored Pools (Football + F1)UFC F296Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 3 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 2 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: 1 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance without going over (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-296-edwards-vs-covington/matchesMatches(2 points each)14. Leon Edwards vs. Colby Covington 13. Alexandre Pantoja vs. Brandon Royval (must get both correct to proceed)12. Shavkat Rakhmonov vs. Stephen Thompson11. Tony Ferguson vs. Paddy Pimblett10. Vicente Luque vs. Ian Machado Garry(1 point each)9. Josh Emmett vs. Bryce Mitchell8. Irene Aldana vs. Karol Rosa7. Cody Garbrandt vs. Brian Kelleher6. Casey O’Neill vs. Ariane Lipski5. Alonzo Menifield vs. Dustin Jacoby4. Tagir Ulanbekov vs. Cody Durden3. Andre Fili vs. Lucas Almeida2. Martin Buday vs. Shamil Gaziev1. Randy Brown vs. Muslim SalikhovNOT go the Full Distance   Make sure your Prediction is in this format    Example14. Leon Edwards13. Alexandre Pantoja 12. Shavkat Rakhmonov 11. Tony Ferguson 10. Vicente Luque 9. Josh Emmett 8. Irene Aldana 7. Cody Garbrandt 6. Casey O’Neill 5. Alonzo Menifield 4. Tagir Ulanbekov 3. Andre Fili 2. Martin Buday 1. Randy Brown NOT go the Full Distance 9
